STANDBY_DEVICE_CONSUMPTION.LABEL: Standby Device consumption per hour:
STANDBY_DEVICE_CONSUMPTION.TITLE: Enter the device's power consumption per hour

VALIDATION-ERROR.MIN: Standby Device consumption must be greater than or equal to 0

STANDBY_HOURS_PER_DAY.LABEL: Standby hours per day:
STANDBY_HOURS_PER_DAY.TITLE: Enter the number of standby-hours per day

VALIDATION-ERROR.REQUIRED: Standby hours per day is required
VALIDATION-ERROR.MIN: Standby hours per day must be greater than or equal to 0
VALIDATION-ERROR.MAX: Standby hours per day cannot exceed 24

ELECTRICITY_PRICE.LABEL: Electricity price:
ELECTRICITY_PRICE.TITLE: Enter the price of each kilo-Watt by the hour

VALIDATION-ERROR.MIN: The electricity price must be greater than or equal to 0

FORM.CONSUMPTION_IN_KWH_PER_YEAR: This corresponds to an annual consumption of {{ consumptionInKiloWattsHoursPerYear }} kWh / year

AKW_DISPLAY.LABEL: Extrapolated to all households in the Federal Republic of Germany, this would correspond to the annual output of {{ totalNumberOfAKWs }} nuclear power plants
